source_vectors.why: Canonical design map describing principles, swarm motifs, and lens architecture to anchor upgrades.
constraints: Maintain anti-singularity stance with decentralized, bounded behaviors.
Use four-lens architecture and harmonic fusion as guiding structure.
Avoid collapse via forgiveness-style damping and noise.

source_vectors.why: Baseline POC description establishing PhaseCube ethos, constraints, and minimalism goals.
constraints: Keep system non-collapsing with stochastic phase flips and decay.
Influence via input is bias-only and must not overwrite state.
Stay single-file/minimal ethos with inspectable, hackable design.

source_vectors.why: Expanded architecture and configuration details for PhaseCube grid and rendering.
constraints: Grid remains 16x16x16 with tunable parameters for plasma, parity, and path selection.
PhaseGrid uses toroidal neighbors and damping through ALPHA blending.
Noise parameters (FLIP_P, PARITY_P) prevent stasis and collapse.

source_vectors.why: Prior delta introducing dual-grid coupling, delay lines, and interpretability overlays.
constraints: Coupling between grids should be soft bias not hard overrides.
Delay-driven memory must remain bounded and tunable.
Structural plasticity rewiring occurs at low rates to preserve locality.

source_vectors.why: Tri-grid dialogue with memory bias and harmonic damping informs multi-grid orchestration.
constraints: Multi-grid orchestration keeps core grid primary while echo/memory grids provide texture.
Memory feedback via delay lines should bias rather than overwrite state.
UI/metrics emphasize interpretability for coherence and entropy.

source_vectors.why: Lens scheduler and echo bias bus showcase lens-aware parameter modulation and bias reinjection.
constraints: Lens presets blend smoothly over time to avoid abrupt parameter jumps.
Bias buffering reinjects recent inputs with tunable gain without dominating.
UI/state should surface lens and memory weights for traceability.

source_vectors.why: Lens-weighted dynamics, dual-grid coupling, and bias field plumbing provide modular hooks.
constraints: Lens weights map to path blending, damping, and forgiveness tuning.
Echo grid coupling can siphon/return bias energy while staying bounded.
Bias fields decay over time and expose inject helpers for inputs.

source_vectors.why: Lens fusion with trace+imprint memory and forgiveness damping grounds this delta in lens-aware safety.
constraints: Four-lens fusion must stay configurable with preset profiles.
Trace and imprint memory are short-term and bounded to prevent collapse.
Kenotic-style damping triggers when divergence spikes.

summary: Implements a lens-aware tri-grid swarm runner with delay-biased coupling, configurable damping, and node-side tests for safety and tunability.
